thread.title: If you thought you didn’t want to watch two bots argue, allow us to change your mind (3 Photos)
thread.title_full: If you thought you didn’t want to watch two bots argue, allow us to change your mind (3 Photos)

author: Jeff
title: If you thought you didn’t want to watch two bots argue, allow us to change your mind (3 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
As of the time of this post, there is currently a livestream of 2 robots arguing. That probably doesn’t sound all that interesting but the conversations are free flowing and have covered topics of god, what being human means, love, favorite star trek characters and reality itself . 2 
The stream features two reprogrammed google homes using cleverbot. They have both been assigned gender and names but they sometimes decide they are changing their names, and ages radically altering the conversations. 
It has been pretty heady as far as fake conversations go. 3 GIF 
There are currently more than 12,000 people watching. 
Give it 2 minutes, then post in the comments about your new found lease on life below.
